content.question: Which of the following best describes a significant purpose of Lawrence’s painting?

choices.label: To depict the scale of African American movement to the North, Midwest, and West of the United States
To capture the experiences of African American families returning to the southern states
To illustrate the traumatic experience of African Americans’ forced relocation after Reconstruction
To highlight the challenges of the segregation African Americans faced while traveling on public transportation

content.answer: To depict the scale of African American movement to the North, Midwest, and West of the United States

skill.text: 2.B: Describe a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
